title: Diamond Support main LF Diamond+ 5s team
body:
Diamond support main for 3 seasons looking for a serious Diamond+ ranked 5s team to climb highly on the Ranked 5s ladder with.

Can play all supports well, however I main Janna/Nami/Thresh.

Available all days/nights and have all communication software, including a very good headset and computer.

Feel free to add me ingame/comment below.

(Can also bring a Diamond 4 ADC *Master tier in preseason* with me if also looking for an ADC)

IGN: Makkam
